column1: * 1938 - Actor Wi Kuki Kaa is born.
* 1955 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Mr Capan.
* 1956 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Mr Britten (16 December 1956).
* 1956 - The fifth episode of The Lord of the Rings (1955 radio series) of The Lord of the Rings airs on the BBC Third Programme.
* 1963 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Baronne A. Baeyens.
* 1980 - The BBC parody series Hordes of the Things finishes airing.
